targets.expr: 1 - sum without(instance, state) (kv_vb_itm_memory_bytes{cluster_name=~"$cluster",bucket=~"$bucket"})/ sum without(instance, state) (kv_vb_itm_memory_uncompressed_bytes{cluster_name=~"$cluster",bucket=~"$bucket"})

panels.description: Number of get operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a hit
panels.title: Get Hits / sec

panels.description: Number of get operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a miss
panels.title: Get Misses / sec

panels.description: Number of set (write) operations per second to a bucket
panels.title: Set Hits / sec

panels.description: Number of CAS operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a hit
panels.title: CAS Hits / sec

panels.description: Number of CAS operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a miss
panels.title: CAS Misses / sec

panels.description: Number of CAS operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a Bad Value
panels.title: CAS Bad Value / sec

panels.description: Number of delete operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a hit
panels.title: Delete Hits / sec

panels.description: Number of delete operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a miss
panels.title: Delete Misses / sec

panels.description: Number of lock operations per second to a bucket
panels.title: Locks / sec

panels.description: Number of increment operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a hit
panels.title: Increment Hits / sec

panels.description: Number of increment operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a miss
panels.title: Increment Misses / sec

panels.description: Number of flush operations per second to a bucket
panels.title: Flush / sec

panels.description: Number of decrement operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a hit
panels.title: Decrement Hits / sec

panels.description: Number of decrement operations per second to a bucket that resulted in a miss
panels.title: Decrement Misses / sec

panels.description: Number of unique items in this bucket - only active items, not replica
panels.title: Current Items

panels.description: Number of unique items in this bucket - active + replica
panels.title: Current Items Total

panels.description: Number of bytes per second sent from this bucket
panels.title: IO Write Bytes / sec

panels.description: Average drift (in seconds) per mutation on active vBuckets
panels.title: Active Clock Drift

panels.description: Average drift (in seconds) per mutation on replica vBuckets
panels.title: Replica Clock Drift

panels.description: Number of bytes per second read from this bucket
panels.title: IO Read Bytes / sec / sec

panels.description: Background fetch time in microseconds
panels.title: Background Wait TIme

panels.description: Total number of ahead exceptions for all active vBuckets
panels.title: Active Ahead Exceptions / sec

panels.description: Total number of ahead exceptions for all replica vBuckets
panels.title: Replica Ahead Exceptions / sec

panels.description: The number of HLC updates that had a value ahead of the local HLC and were over the   drift_ahead_threshold.
panels.title: CAS Drift Threshold Exceeded Ops / sec

panels.description: Total Memory Used
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Amount of memory consumed by active vBuckets
panels.title: Active vBucket Memory

panels.description: Amount of memory consumed by replica vBuckets
panels.title: Replica vBucket Memory

panels.description: Extra memory used by transient data like persistence queues, replication queues, checkpoints, etc.
panels.title: Memory Overhead

panels.description: Amount of memory being consumed for metadata for active vBuckets
panels.title: Active vBucket Metadata Memory

panels.description: Amount of memory being consumed for metadata for replica vBuckets
panels.title: Replica vBucket Metadata Memory

panels.description: Number of times temporary OOMs happened while processing operations.  Number of back-offs sent per second to client SDKs due to "out of memory" situations from this bucket.
panels.title: Temp OOMs

panels.description: Number of times unrecoverable OOMs happened while processing operations.
panels.title: Hard OOM Errors

panels.description: The number of non-resident items, both active and replica
panels.title: Non-Resident Items

panels.description: Number of items per second evicted from this bucket
panels.title: Ejections / sec

panels.description: Number of items per second expired from this bucket
panels.title: Expiries / sec

panels.description:
Number of items fetched from disk.

ep_bg_meta_fetched - 
Number of meta items fetched from disk.

ep_bg_remaining_jobs - 
Number of remaining bg fetch jobs.
panels.title: Item Disk Fetches / sec

panels.description: Number of meta items fetched from disk.
panels.title: Meta Disk Fetches / sec

panels.description: Number of remaining bg fetch jobs.
panels.title: Remaining Disk Jobs

panels.description: Number of Items in the Disk Queue
panels.title: Disk Queue items

panels.description: Items added to disk queue per second
panels.title: Disk Queue Fill Items / sec

panels.description: Items drained from the disk queue per second
panels.title: Disk Queue Drain Items / sec

panels.description: Disk commits.
panels.title: Disk Commits/sec

panels.description: Number of disk write and read failures
panels.title: Disk Write Failures / sec

panels.description: Total size of valid data in db files
panels.title: DB Data Size

panels.description: Total size of the db files
panels.title: DB File Size

panels.description: Number of disk write and read failures (measured from ep_data_write_failed  and ep_data_read_failed)
panels.title: Disk Read Failures / sec

panels.description: Number of items currently being written.
panels.title: Flusher Todo

panels.description: Number of times an item failed to flush due to storage errors.
panels.title: Flush Item Failures

panels.description: Number of times a transaction failed to commit due to storage errors.
panels.title: Commit Failures

panels.description: Incoming XDCR operations per second for this bucket
panels.title: Total XDCR Ops / sec

panels.description: Number of set operations per second for this bucket as the target for XDCR
panels.title: Set Metadata Ops / sec

panels.description: Number of delete operations per second for this bucket as the target for XDCR
panels.title: Delete Metadata Ops / sec

panels.description: Number of metadata read operations per second for this bucket as the target for XDCR
panels.title: Get Metadata Ops / sec

panels.description: Number of setRetMeta operations per second for this bucket as the target for XDCR
panels.title: setRet Metadata Ops / sec

panels.description: Number of delRetMeta operations per second for this bucket as the target for XDCR.
panels.title: DelRet Metadata Ops / sec

panels.description: Number of Get Metadata for Set operations per second for this bucket as the target for XDCR.
panels.title: Get Metadata for Set Ops / sec
